snippet.title: First Look: Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator (Dreamcast) | Unreleased Game!
snippet.description:
In this special episode of First Look, I take a look at the unreleased Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series for the Sega Dreamcast. Big thanks to psycho and SiZiOUS for making this happen!

Download it here:
https://www.dreamcast-talk.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=22&t=12020

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pcwzrd13
Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaBV1CKDjQmc-CKiMEFxsAA/join
Buy a Dreamcastic T-Shirt: http://dreamcasticshop.spreadshirt.com
